an1.82-97:82.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as negligence.
an1.82-97:83.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as diligence.
an1.82-97:84.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as laziness.
an1.82-97:85.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as arousing energy.
an1.82-97:86.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as having many wishes.
an1.82-97:86.1.2: Having many wishes is very harmful.”
an1.82-97:87.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as having few wishes.
an1.82-97:87.1.2: Having few wishes is very beneficial.”
an1.82-97:88.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as lack of contentment.
an1.82-97:88.1.2: Lack of contentment is very harmful.”
an1.82-97:89.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as contentment.
an1.82-97:90.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as improper attention.
an1.82-97:91.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as proper attention.
an1.82-97:92.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as lack of situational awareness.
an1.82-97:92.1.2: Lack of situational awareness is very harmful.”
an1.82-97:93.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as situational awareness.
an1.82-97:94.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as bad friends.
an1.82-97:95.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as good friends.
an1.82-97:96.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as pursuing bad habits and not good habits.
an1.82-97:96.1.2: Pursuing bad habits and not good habits is very harmful.”
an1.82-97:97.1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as pursuing good habits and not bad habits.
an1.82-97:97.1.2: Pursuing good habits and not bad habits is very beneficial.”
